author: albusjuly
title: Last minute stay wonderful staff
text:
My husband and I had to unexpectedly come to Uganda for urgent business and booked last minute in Forest Cottages because it was close to a specific org and the price was right. Ended up loving the place. First, the staff was incredibly flexible and helped us out so much with our changing plans (we booked one person for a day but ended up being 2 people for nearly a week)! Staff went above and beyond. The hotel grounds were full of lush green plants and tall trees--it's beautifully done and would be great for a casual, family event. In short: Laid back, easy going, superb staff,
affordable and good for families. Tip: Pay extra for the bigger room and keep an eye out for birds and other wildlife in the tree tops outside the window.
